body:
reads:

When Llanowar Sentinel enters the battlefield, you may pay {1}{G}. If you do, search your library for a card named Llanowar Sentineland put that card [...]

missing space after "Llanowar Sentinel" and in front of "and"
author: [Landhotel.Westerwald](https://code.google.com/u/Landhotel.Westerwald/)
title: Llanowar Sentinel: missing space in notification

comments.body:
